title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. However, they do not have any effect. If a small image, such as an icon, is opened, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not do anything.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around.
3. Try opening a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars do not have any effect.
